languages.text: "А, кузина! Ты неведомым образом вымолила прощение у того, кого предала в объятья Комморры — а теперь намерена пойти против {mf|его|ее} воли, убив меня? Опять тебя подводит ваша хваленая азурианская выдержка... как и в прошлый раз, не так ли?"

"Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."
languages.original_text: "А, кузина! Ты неведомым образом вымолила прощение у того, кого предала в объятья Комморры — а теперь намерена пойти против {mf|его|ее} воли, убив меня? Опять тебя подводит ваша хваленая азурианская выдержка... как и в прошлый раз, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much like it had already failed you."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much like it had already failed you."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much like it had already failed you."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: « Ah, ma chère cousine ! Vous avez réussi par miracle à obtenir le pardon de {mf|celui|celle} que vous avez {mf|trahi|trahie} en {mf|le|la} livrant à Commorragh, et maintenant, vous comptez aller à l'encontre de sa volonté et me tuer ? Les Asuryanis sont réputés pour leur maîtrise d'eux-mêmes... mais il semblerait que vous soyez l'exception qui confirme la règle. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, ma chère cousine ! Vous avez réussi par miracle à obtenir le pardon de {mf|celui|celle} que vous avez {mf|trahi|trahie} en {mf|le|la} livrant à Commorragh, et maintenant, vous comptez aller à l'encontre de sa volonté et me tuer ? Les Asuryanis sont réputés pour leur maîtrise d'eux-mêmes... mais il semblerait que vous êtes l'exception qui confirme la règle. »
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: “啊，我的表妹！你莫名其妙地赢得了{mf|他|她}的信任，可你却背叛了{mf|他|她}，把{mf|他|她}推向了科摩罗的怀抱！而现在，你又打算违背{mf|他|她}的意愿，杀了我？你们方舟灵族以克制为荣，可在我看来，你好像也不怎么样嘛……和之前一样差劲。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: “啊，我的表妹！你莫名其妙地赢得了{mf|他|她}的信任，可你却背叛了{mf|他|她}，把{mf|他|她}推向了科摩罗的怀抱！而现在，你又打算违背{mf|他|她}的意愿，杀了我？你们方舟灵族以克制为荣，可在我看来，你好像也不怎么样嘛……而且你已经放任过一次了。”
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: 「おお、いとこよ！お前は自分から裏切ってコモラフの包囲に追い込んだ相手から許しをどうにか得たのに、今度は俺を殺して{mf|彼|彼女}の意思に逆らうつもりなのか？褒めそやされたアシュリヤーニの自制心とやらは役に立ってないようだな…前と同じように」
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: 「おお、いとこよ！お前は自分から裏切ってコモラフの包囲に追い込んだ相手から許しをどうにか得たのに、今度は俺を殺して{mf|彼|彼女}の意思に逆らうつもりなのか？褒めそやされたアシュリヤーニの自制心とやらは役に立ってないようだな…前と同じように」
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Ah, Vetter! Irgendwie habt Ihr es tatsächlich geschafft, Vergebung von {mf|demjenigen|derjenigen} zu erlangen, {mf|den|die} Ihr verraten und in Commorraghs Umarmung gestoßen habt. Und jetzt wollt Ihr Euch gegen {mf|seinen|ihren} Willen stellen und mich töten? Eure gelobte Zurückhaltung als Asuryani verlässt Euch ... oder hat Euch längst verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Vetter! Irgendwie habt Ihr es tatsächlich geschafft, Vergebung von {mf|demjenigen|derjenigen} zu erlangen, {mf|den|die} Ihr verraten und in Commorraghs Umarmung gestoßen habt. Und jetzt wollt Ihr Euch gegen {mf|seinen|ihren} Willen stellen und mich töten?" Eure gelobte Zurückhaltung als Asuryani verlässt Euch ... ssie hat Euch schon lange verlassen."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: «¡Ah, prima! De algún modo inexplicable te has ganado el perdón de {mf|aquel al|aquella a la} que traicionaste y enviaste al seno de Commorragh, ¿y ahora pretendes rebelarte contra su voluntad matándome? Esa moderación Asuryani tan cacareada te está fallando... una vez más».
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, prima! De algún modo inexplicable te has ganado el perdón de {mf|aquel al|aquella a la} que traicionaste y enviaste al seno de Commorragh, ¿y ahora pretendes rebelarte contra su voluntad matándome? Esa moderación Asuryani tan cacareada te está fallando... como ya había hecho antes».
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: "Sevgili kuzenim! İhanet edip Commorragh'ın kucağına ittiğin {mf|adamın|kadının} affına sığındın. Bağışlanman gerçek bir mucize. Hâl böyleyken beni öldürüp onun iradesine karşı mı geleceksin? Öve öve bitiremediğin Asuryani dizginlerin, seni yarı yolda bırakıyor... Daha önce olduğu gibi."
languages.original_text: "Ah, cousin! You have inexplicably managed to earn the forgiveness of the one you betrayed and pushed into Commorragh's embrace, and now you intend to go against {mf|his|her} will by killing me? Your lauded Asuryani restraint is failing you... much as it has before."

traits.locale_text: "Sevgili kuzenim! İhanet edip Commorragh'ın kucağına ittiğin {mf|adamın|kadının} affına sığındın. Bağışlanman gerçek bir mucize. Hâl böyleyken beni öldürüp onun iradesine karşı mı geleceksin? Öve öve bitiremediğin Asuryani dizginlerin, seni yarı yolda bırakıyor... Daha önce olduğu gibi."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai
